// src/pages/dashboard.jsx import React from "react"; import { RiBankLine, RiMoneyDollarCircleLine, RiFileListLine, RiShieldCheckLine, RiBankCardLine, RiHandCoinLine, RiTrainLine, RiShoppingCartLine, RiSearchLine, RiUser3Line, RiNotification3Line, RiArrowRightLine, } from "react-icons/ri"; /** * HDFC-styled Dashboard * - Uses Tailwind tokens (bg-hdfc-blue, btn-hdfc, etc.) * - Uses .card-surface for white textured cards */ export default function Dashboard() { // mock data — replace with API state as needed const balance = "₹ 4,57,830.00"; const recentTx = [ { id: 1, title: "UPI - Grocery Store", amount: "-₹ 1,250", date: "Nov 28" }, { id: 2, title: "Salary Credit", amount: "+₹ 65,000", date: "Nov 25" }, { id: 3, title: "Electricity Bill", amount: "-₹ 2,850", date: "Nov 22" }, ]; return (
{/* Top strip */}
{/* Header */}

Welcome back

Complete your KYC to unlock full account features, higher limits and instant offers.

} title="Accounts" /> } title="Deposits" /> } title="Loans" /> } title="Investments" /> } title="Insurance" /> } title="Cards" /> } title="Payments" /> } title="UPI & QR" />
{/* Offer Banner */}

Instant approval. No medical tests required.

    {recentTx.map((t) => (
  • {t.title}

} title="Shop" subtitle="Marketplace" /> } title="Bills" subtitle="Pay Bills" /> } title="Travel" subtitle="Book Tickets" /> } title="Bank Services" subtitle="Service Requests" />
); } /* Service card */ function ServiceCard({ icon, title }) { return ( ); } /* Quick link card */ function QuickCard({ icon, title, subtitle }) { return (
